column1: Uchi////We stopped by to get a late night meal
column2: super helpful staff that tolerated my bfs love for chitchat very graciously :). 5 stars for service only as I feel as though I can't really speak to the food here after just coming back from japan. It's been a few years since I've last been to Uchi
column3: and I remembered the food to be much more amazing than my most recent experience. It wasn't any worse than Japanese food in japan
column4: so I think that at least says it's very authentic and is right on the money! I recommend getting the sake that comes in the boxes!! Always a fun experience :) also
column5: I'd not recommend the ice fish.
